sys_script_include.name: updateLogg

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_9a98d33f978cc21043513f2ad053af32
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_1305995_first_ap.updateLogg</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>updateLogg</name><script><![CDATA[var updateLogg = Class.create();
updateLogg.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	updateLog:function(){
		var url=this.getParameter('sysparm_url');
		var table=this.getParameter('sysparm_table');
		var Gr=new GlideRecord(table);
		Gr.query();
		while(Gr.next()){
			Gr.setValue('url',url);
			Gr.update();
		}
		return JSON.stringify('Data Updated!!!');
		
	},

    type: 'updateLogg'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-02-06 12:00:35</sys_created_on><sys_id>9a98d33f978cc21043513f2ad053af32</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>updateLogg</sys_name><sys_package display_value="First_app" source="x_1305995_first_ap">af3cc203977b311043513f2ad053af16</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="First_app">af3cc203977b311043513f2ad053af16</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_9a98d33f978cc21043513f2ad053af32</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-02-06 12:08:18</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
